outline:
1. to strike, strike off
    1. (Piel) to strike off skin
  2. to go around, compass, round
    1. (Qal) to go around
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to go around, surround, encompass, enclose
      2. to make the round, complete the circuit
      3. to make round, round off
kjv_def: compass (about, -ing), cut down, destroy, go round (about), inclose, round.
strongs_def: to strike with more or less violence (beat, fell, corrode); by implication (of attack) to knock together, i.e. surround or circulate
